summary: This is my modified version of Elys_Uncapper.ini for mages, and yes, its balanced :) (i think :D)
descriptionHtml:
This is a modified version of Elys Uncapper mod, go check it out ----> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?
  This modified version is for mages and nothing else, and if your a (pure) mage, yes, its balanced :) . ( you can use it if you want on your warrior, but it wont have balance ^^)

==================================================================================================================================

[center][size=4]Q&A[/size][/center]
  Player: Why is it balanced?
  Me: Its balanced because its not like the one that you just installed (if you installed Elys's uncapper, because you NEED it!). I tweaked some things on the .ini file, for example, the amount of magicka, health and stamina that you get, also, the experience that you get when wielding a bow/1-handed/2-handed (its going to be less, because its not mage-like to use warrior/thief/ranger/Archer/assassin stuff).

  Player: Is version [x] the same as version [latest version]
  Me: Of course! Naah, just kidding, its different, maybe for a digit, maybe for 21412414124129185716713 digits, who knows?

==================================================================================================================================

  If you got any questions that you would like to be answered, please post your comment in the post section/Forum section, i will answer as soon as i can :)
  If you want to contact me click the Contact below the images, i will answer as soon as i can :)

==================================================================================================================================

  Version 2.0: Tweaked some things
  Version 1.0: Minor tweaks

==================================================================================================================================

  Requirements : 
 -Skyrim (obvious xD)
 -Elys Uncapper mod (link : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/? )
 -SKSE
author: Elys for the Uncapper and MrBattleAxe for modifying it
